name: Scholar Stream
techStack: React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Firebase
description: Scholar Stream is an educational platform where students can discover scholarships, skill-development programs, and learning opportunities. The platform focuses on clean UI, smooth animations, and an intuitive user experience.
challenges: Ensuring smooth animations while maintaining performance and full responsiveness across all devices.
futurePlans: Implement dark mode, add role-based dashboards, and load data dynamically from a backend API.

name: Rent Wheels
techStack: React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS
description: Rent Wheels is a modern car rental platform that allows users to browse vehicles, view details, and make bookings easily with a smooth user experience.
challenges: Managing backend API integration, dynamic data handling, and maintaining UI consistency.
futurePlans: Add authentication, payment gateway integration, booking history, and an admin dashboard.

name: Obys Agency Website
techStack: HTML, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, GSAP, Locomotive Scroll
description: An animation-driven agency website inspired by modern design studios, focusing on immersive scrolling and motion-based storytelling.
challenges: Synchronizing complex animations using GSAP and Locomotive Scroll without affecting performance.
futurePlans: Integrate a CMS, optimize animations further, and add more interactive sections.
